title: 20 Award Winning Architectural Designs From A Design Award & Competition
description: This article has been brought to you by A’ Design Award and Competition. A’ Design Award & Competition is the Worlds’ leading design accolade reaching design enthusiasts around the world, and showcasing award winners from 114 different design disciplines. A’ Design Award winning works are translated to all major languages in order to connect design […]
author: Erin
excerpt: A’ Design Award & Competition is the Worlds’ leading design accolade reaching design enthusiasts around the world.
text: This article has been brought to you by A’ Design Award and Competition. A’ Design Award & Competition is the Worlds’ leading design accolade reaching design enthusiasts around the world, and showcasing award winners from 114 different design disciplines. A’ Design Award winning works are translated to all major languages in order to connect design lovers, press members and design buyers from across the globe. You can register your design, here. Nanbu Eye Gymnasium by Li Yang and Xu Haifeng. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by Dong Liang and Zhang Hongge. Find out more here. A’ Design Award and Competitions are organized and awarded annually in over 100 different categories that include: Good Industrial Design Award, Good Architecture Design Award, Good Product Design Award, Good Communication Design Award, Good Service Design Award and the Good Fashion Design Award. You can see all of the award categories – here. Marche Vison Market by Tomoya Akasaka. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by ToLoLo Studio. Find out more here. The A’ Architecture, Building and Structure Design Competition is a specialized design competition open to both concept stage and realized architectural projects, urban design projects and buildings designed by architects, architecture offices, real estate developers and construction companies worldwide. Shenzhen Art Museum New Venue and Library North Branch by KSP Engel and Zhubo Design. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by RAWVISION studio, Qiao Zhong. Find out more here. Let’s have a look at some more of the winning architecture projects from the last awards… Zhejiang Pinghu Sports Center by Frederic Rolland, Jia Jiong and Wang Hanlu. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by SANQIAN VISUAL IMAGE ART. Find out more here. Pottery Art Gallery Mixed Use Architecture by You Young Jae. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Namgoong Sun. Find out more here. 249 Design Hotel Hospitality Building by Alberto Torres. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by Michel Luís dos Santos. Find out more here. Anji Creative Design Center Urban and Rural Area by Atelier Deshaus. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Anjihood. Find out more here. Shenzhen Book Mall Bay Area Branch by Zhubo Design. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by Green Snail. Find out more here. Chuxin Pavilion Community Service Center by Jian Wu. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by Jian Wu. Find out more here. Casa de Mar Single Family Residence by Binomio Taller. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Tamara Uribe. Find out more here. Gushan Fish Market by C.M Chao Architect and Planners. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by C.M.Chao. Find out more here. Wooden Axis Large Roof Clinic and Pharmacy by Yoshiaki Tanaka. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by ToLoLo studio. Find out more here. House Symbiosis Double Residency by Direction Architects. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Studio Naaro. Find out more here. House D Living Space by Gangrong He. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Gangrong He. Find out more here. Villa A Weekend House by Eitaro Satake and Miki Okuno – teamSTAR. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Kenya Chiba. Find out more here. Twenty Five Street Home Residential and Commercial Building by Daniel de Amorim. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Metrik Studio. Find out more here. Chongwen Langyue Exhibition Center by Qun Wen. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Find out more here. Sunopy Sun and Rain Protection For Walkways by Peter Kuczia. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Shapeslinestudio. Find out more here. In Between House by Seyedjalil Mousavi. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Mohammad Hassan Ettefagh. Find out more here. Wenzhou Christine Wedding Art Center by Antistatics Architecture. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Dachou Wang. Find out more here. To be part of the A’ Design Award and Competition you can register – here.Learn more about A’ Design Award and Competition – here. The winners and results announced to the public and posted on CONTEMPORIST on May 1st, 2024. contemporist has partnered with A’ Design Award and Competition to bring you this editorial feature
html:
This article has been brought to you by A’ Design Award and Competition.

A’ Design Award & Competition is the Worlds’ leading design accolade reaching design enthusiasts around the world, and showcasing award winners from 114 different design disciplines.

A’ Design Award winning works are translated to all major languages in order to connect design lovers, press members and design buyers from across the globe. You can register your design, here.

Nanbu Eye Gymnasium by Li Yang and Xu Haifeng. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by Dong Liang and Zhang Hongge. Find out more here.

A’ Design Award and Competitions are organized and awarded annually in over 100 different categories that include: Good Industrial Design Award, Good Architecture Design Award, Good Product Design Award, Good Communication Design Award, Good Service Design Award and the Good Fashion Design Award. You can see all of the award categories – here.

Marche Vison Market by Tomoya Akasaka. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by ToLoLo Studio. Find out more here.

The A’ Architecture, Building and Structure Design Competition is a specialized design competition open to both concept stage and realized architectural projects, urban design projects and buildings designed by architects, architecture offices, real estate developers and construction companies worldwide.

Shenzhen Art Museum New Venue and Library North Branch by KSP Engel and Zhubo Design. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by RAWVISION studio, Qiao Zhong. Find out more here.

Let’s have a look at some more of the winning architecture projects from the last awards…

Zhejiang Pinghu Sports Center by Frederic Rolland, Jia Jiong and Wang Hanlu. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by SANQIAN VISUAL IMAGE ART. Find out more here.
Pottery Art Gallery Mixed Use Architecture by You Young Jae. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Namgoong Sun. Find out more here.
249 Design Hotel Hospitality Building by Alberto Torres. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by Michel Luís dos Santos. Find out more here.
Anji Creative Design Center Urban and Rural Area by Atelier Deshaus. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Anjihood. Find out more here.
Shenzhen Book Mall Bay Area Branch by Zhubo Design. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by Green Snail. Find out more here.
Chuxin Pavilion Community Service Center by Jian Wu. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024.. Photography by Jian Wu. Find out more here.
Casa de Mar Single Family Residence by Binomio Taller. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Tamara Uribe. Find out more here.
Gushan Fish Market by C.M Chao Architect and Planners. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Imagery by C.M.Chao. Find out more here.
Wooden Axis Large Roof Clinic and Pharmacy by Yoshiaki Tanaka. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by ToLoLo studio. Find out more here.
House Symbiosis Double Residency by Direction Architects. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Studio Naaro. Find out more here.
House D Living Space by Gangrong He. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Gangrong He. Find out more here.
Villa A Weekend House by Eitaro Satake and Miki Okuno – teamSTAR. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Kenya Chiba. Find out more here.
Twenty Five Street Home Residential and Commercial Building by Daniel de Amorim. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Metrik Studio. Find out more here.
Chongwen Langyue Exhibition Center by Qun Wen. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Find out more here.
Sunopy Sun and Rain Protection For Walkways by Peter Kuczia. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Shapeslinestudio. Find out more here.
In Between House by Seyedjalil Mousavi. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Mohammad Hassan Ettefagh. Find out more here.
Wenzhou Christine Wedding Art Center by Antistatics Architecture. Winner in Architecture, Building and Structure Design Category, 2023 – 2024. Photography by Dachou Wang. Find out more here.

To be part of the A’ Design Award and Competition you can register – here.
Learn more about A’ Design Award and Competition – here.

The winners and results announced to the public and posted on CONTEMPORIST on May 1st, 2024.

contemporist has partnered with A’ Design Award and Competition to bring you this editorial feature
